general_description: Tree 6 to 10 meters tall, with cylindrical branches.
Flower: Inflorescence in axillary racemes, 5.1-21.0 × 0.1-0.3 cm. Flowers with green sepals and red petals, the upper petal featuring a yellow to white patch speckled with red.
Fruit: Legume, 29.5-46.3 × 4.1-5.0 cm, linear to oblong, with a green to brown coloration; 32 seeds per fruit, measuring 1.8-1.9 × 0.5 cm.
Leaf: Bipinnate leaves with petioles measuring 2.5-8.8 × 0.1-0.3 cm and a terete rachis measuring 3.5-17.5 × 0.1-0.2 cm; 6-20 pairs of pinnae; 10-30 pairs of opposite, chartaceous, discolorous leaflets, oblong, 0.3-0.9 × 0.2-0.5 cm, with an acute apex and asymmetric base.
